data.title: Interstellar (12A) IMAX 70mm 10th Anniversary re-release
data.meta_description: Experience Christopher Nolan’s Interstellar in captivating IMAX 70mm.
data.text:
Experience Christopher Nolan’s Interstellar in captivating IMAX 70mm.

In this blockbuster sci-fi adventure, a team of explorers undertakes the most important mission in human history, travelling beyond our galaxy to discover whether mankind has a future among the stars, as our time on Earth draws to an end.

To mark the 10th year anniversary since its release, Interstellar will be showing in the Science Museum’s IMAX: The Ronson Theatre, one of only two cinemas in the UK screening the film in stunning IMAX® 1.43 aspect ratio and accompanied with an immersive sound system. This is the ultimate way to relive the intergalactic experience of Interstellar.

From acclaimed director Christopher Nolan (Inception, Dunkirk, Tenet, The Dark Knight Trilogy) and starring Mathew McConaughey, Anne Hathaway, Jessica Chastain, Casey Affleck and Michael Caine, scored by legendary composer Hans Zimmer.
